items.name: Stone of Return
items.description: A mystical stone that returns you to the surface of Zurath.

paths.title: Whispers of Zukarath
paths.description: Follow the guidance of the Zukran Masters to prove your worth.
paths.activeText: Continue your trials with the Zukran Masters to prove your worth.
paths.completionText: You have completed the Journey of Whispers, you are now a full member of the Zukaran Order of Magi!

paths.title: Echoes of Zurath
paths.description: Uncover the hidden Echoes within Zurath.

paths.title: Seeking Corruption
paths.description: Seek out the corruption within Zurath’s depths.
paths.completionText: You have uncovered signs of corruption.

tasks.title: Prepare for the Depths
tasks.description: You must use the Stone of Veil Piercing to bypass the magical barrier and reach Tier 7.
tasks.completionText: Use the Stone when you are ready .

tasks.title: Transport to the Depths
tasks.description: Are you now ready to face the next challenge?.
tasks.completionText: You are ready to face the depths of Zurath.

tasks.title: Gather Shards
tasks.description: Find 15 Ashen Shards.
tasks.completionText: You have gathered 15 Ashen Shards.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have returned to Sehnrhyx Syliri.

tasks.title: Turn In Shards
tasks.description: Give 15 Ashen Shards to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: The shards have been delivered.

paths.title: Whispers of Zukarath
paths.description: Follow the guidance of the Zukran Masters to prove your worth.
paths.activeText: Continue your trials with the Zukran Masters to prove your worth.
paths.completionText: You have completed the Journey of Whispers, you are now a full member of the Zukaran Order of Magi!

paths.title: Enter Zurath
paths.description: Begin your journey by entering Zurath and speaking to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
paths.offerText: Whispers yet echo, and your fate has arrived. You must Enter Zurath to begin your Journey.
paths.acceptedText: You have accepted the Journey of Whispers. Sehnrhyx Syliri will guide you to begin your Journey.
paths.activeText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to start your trials.
paths.completionText: Your training has gone well, you are deemed worthy! You may now enter Zurath to begin your journey on the Path of Whispers.

tasks.title: Setting Forth
tasks.offerText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri about your Journey.
tasks.acceptedText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri about your Journey.
tasks.activeText: Im glad to see you i hope you have prepared well for your journey!.
tasks.completionText: Your training has gone well, you are deemed worthy for the trials.
tasks.description: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri about your Journey.

paths.title: Vestments of the Order
paths.description: Venture into Zurath and defeat the guardian to claim your Vestment of Zukarath.
paths.offerText: Venture into Zurath and defeat the guardian to claim your Vestment of Zukarath. Will you take this challenge?
paths.acceptedText: You have accepted the journey to claim the Vestment of Zukarath.
paths.activeText: Continue your journey to defeat the guardian and claim the Vestment of Zukarath.
paths.completionText: You have earned the Vestment of Zukarath by your valor!

tasks.title: First Descent
tasks.description: Delve down to the third tier of Zurath.
tasks.completionText: You have reached Tier 3.

tasks.title: Battle Tested
tasks.description: Defeat the Guardian.
tasks.completionText: Tier 3 Guardian Defeated.

tasks.title: Vested Acolyte
tasks.description: Recover a Vestment of Zukarath.
tasks.activeText: Find the Vestment of Zukarath on Tier 3.
tasks.completionText: You have claimed your Vestment of Zukarath.

tasks.title: Triumphant Return
tasks.description: Return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.activeText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to report your success.
tasks.completionText: You have returned to Sehnrhyx Syliri.

paths.title: Sigil of the Order
paths.description: Seek the Sigil of Zukarath to solidify your place among the Zukarrii.
paths.completionText: You have earned the Sigil of Zukarath through your valor.

tasks.title: Seek Guidance
tasks.description: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri about your Journey.
tasks.completionText: Sehnrhyx Syliri has guided you toward the Sigil.

tasks.title: Guardian’s Bane
tasks.description: Defeat the guardian on Tier 6.
tasks.completionText: Tier 6 Guardian Defeated.

tasks.title: Claim the Sigil
tasks.description: Recover a Sigil of Zukarath.
tasks.completionText: You have claimed the Sigil of Zukarath.

tasks.title: Attempt the Depths
tasks.description: Attempt to descend to Tier 7.
tasks.completionText: The path to Tier 7 is blocked. Return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have returned to Sehnrhyx Syliri with the Sigil.

paths.title: Seeking Corruption
paths.description: Seek out the corruption within Zurath’s depths.
paths.completionText: You have uncovered signs of corruption.

tasks.title: Prepare for the Depths
tasks.description: You must use the Stone of Veil Piercing to bypass the magical barrier and reach Tier 7.
tasks.completionText: Use the Stone when you are ready .

tasks.title: Transport to the Depths
tasks.description: Are you now ready to face the next challenge?.
tasks.completionText: You are ready to face the depths of Zurath.

tasks.title: Gather Shards
tasks.description: Find 15 Ashen Shards.
tasks.completionText: You have gathered 15 Ashen Shards.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have returned to Sehnrhyx Syliri.

tasks.title: Turn In Shards
tasks.description: Give 15 Ashen Shards to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: The shards have been delivered.

paths.title: Rings of the Magi
paths.description: Acquire the ancient rings to wield greater power.
paths.completionText: You have claimed the Rings of the Magi.

tasks.title: Acquire Band of Zu
tasks.description: Find a Band of Zu in Zurath’s depths.
tasks.completionText: You have acquired a Band of Zu.

tasks.title: Acquire Band of Karn
tasks.description: Find a Band of Karn in Zurath’s depths.
tasks.completionText: You have acquired a Band of Karn.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have returned to Sehnrhyx Syliri.

tasks.title: Speak to Syliri
tasks.description: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have spoken with Sehnrhyx Syliri.

paths.title: Enter Ashangal
paths.description: Seek out echos that may help you discover the entrance to the endless depths of Ashangal.
paths.completionText: You have found the entrance to Ashangal.

tasks.title: Prepare for Ashangal
tasks.description: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri when you are ready to enter Ashangal.
tasks.completionText: You are ready to enter Ashangal.

tasks.title: Reach the Depths
tasks.description: Locate the secret entrance on Tier 10.
tasks.completionText: You have reached Tier 10.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have returned to Sehnrhyx Syliri.

paths.title: Harnessing Corruption
paths.description: Harness the corruption to unlock new powers.
paths.completionText: You have unlocked the power of Portal Binding.

tasks.title: Enter Ashangal
tasks.description: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to teleport to Tier 11.
tasks.completionText: You have entered Ashangal.

tasks.title: Collect Shards
tasks.description: Collect 50 Ashen Shards.
tasks.completionText: You have collected 50 Ashen Shards.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have returned to Sehnrhyx Syliri.

tasks.title: Turn In Shards
tasks.description: Give 50 Ashen Shards to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: The shards have been delivered.

tasks.title: Turn In Echoes Shard
tasks.description: Give the Shard of Echoes to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: The Shard of Echoes reveals the path of Echoes.

paths.title: Listening for Echoes
paths.description: Seek out the Echoes hidden within Zurath.
paths.completionText: You have uncovered the secrets of the Echoes.

tasks.title: Complete Echoes
tasks.description: Complete five Echoes.
tasks.completionText: Five Echoes completed.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Return to Sehnrhyx Syliri to discuss the Echoes.
tasks.completionText: You have shared the Echoes with Sehnrhyx Syliri.

paths.title: Clad in Magic
paths.description: Equip a full set of magic gear to wield its power.
paths.completionText: You are clad in magic, a true Zukarrii.

tasks.title: Continue Echoes
tasks.description: Complete five more Echoes.
tasks.completionText: Five more Echoes completed.

tasks.title: Equip Magic Gear
tasks.description: Equip a full set of magic gear (amulet, dagger, wand, armor, two rings).
tasks.completionText: You have equipped a full set of magic gear.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have proven your magical prowess.

paths.title: Echoes of Zurath
paths.description: Uncover the hidden Echoes within Zurath.
